THE PULSE OF MEDICAL INGENUITY

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][nectar_btn size=”medium” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” url=”/case-studies/” text=”Watch New Case Studies”]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1508612890644{padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;}”]

ENGINEERING INNOVATIVE DEVICES

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1508447587218{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}” max_width=”640″]Reflow Medical responds to the physician’s need for high-performance, easy-to-use medical devices that help save time, costs, and most importantly, patients’ lives. Every device is designed and engineered by people whose passion for excellence drives continual innovation – the pulse of the company.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ width=”1/1″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” bg_color=”#e3e3e3″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”60″ bottom_padding=”40″ id=”products” overlay_strength=”0.3″][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”top-bottom” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”0.5″ background_color_hover=”#ffffff” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”medium_depth” width=”1/2″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”3px” column_border_color=”#00b3d9″ column_border_style=”solid” enable_border_animation=”true” border_animation_delay=”400″][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-8-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ width=”1/1″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1508256362734{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Shape to Any Angle

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text max_width=”360″]The Spex™ support catheter lets physicians customize the tip for more predicatable access and control.

spex   spexLP[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”top-bottom” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”0.5″ background_color_hover=”#ffffff” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”medium_depth” width=”1/2″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”3px” column_border_color=”#e5a224″ column_border_style=”solid” enable_border_animation=”true” border_animation_delay=”600″][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-8-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ width=”1/1″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1589568951507{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Quickly Cross Complex Lesions, Including Peripheral CTOs

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text max_width=”360″]The Wingman™ Crossing Catheter facilitates rapid, routine lesion crossing on the fly.

VIEW[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_color=”#e3e3e3″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”center” top_padding=”60″ overlay_strength=”0.3″][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1589568709042{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

WINGMAN RECEIVES FDA CLEARANCE FOR PERIPHERAL CTO INDICATION

[/vc_column_text][testimonial_slider style=”minimal” star_rating_color=”accent-color” autorotate=”7000″ disable_height_animation=”true”][testimonial star_rating=”none” title=”Testimonial” id=”1506622881-1-77″ tab_id=”1506623133932-9″ name=”John R. Laird, MD, ” quote=”With this expanded indication, physicians gain the ability to cross CTOs in peripheral lesions with a simple and very effective device” subtitle=”Adventist Heart and CEO Advanced Cardiac & Vascular Institute, St. Helena, California”] Click the edit button to add your testimonial. [/testimonial][/testimonial_slider][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”100″ bottom_padding=”100″ overlay_strength=”0.3″][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/304457236″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-4-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1506630682397{padding-bottom: 5px !important;}”]

FEATURED
CASE STUDY

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1506625252388{padding-bottom: 8px !important;}”]GENDER: Male[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1589569147552{padding-bottom: 8px !important;}”]AGE: 60 years old[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1589569171880{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}”]DEVICE: Spex™ 35 Catheter[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1589569278624{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}”]PHYSICIAN: S. Jay Mathews, MD, MS, FACC[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]• Severe bilateral LE swelling (recently worsening)[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]• Large varicosities[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]• Unable to walk across the room without severe dyspnea[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”medium” button_style=”see-through-2″ hover_text_color_override=”#ffffff” icon_family=”default_arrow” url=”index.php/case-studies/” text=”CASE STUDIES” margin_top=”40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_color=”#009abb” scene_position=”center” text_color=”light” text_align=”left” top_padding=”100″ bottom_padding=”100″ overlay_strength=”0.3″][vc_column column_padding=”padding-3-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” width=”2/3″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”2px” column_border_color=”#ffffff” column_border_style=”solid” enable_border_animation=”true” border_animation_delay=”400″]
